status.disabled: Synchronisation is not enabled, because your Sales Channel is disabled.
status.syncingDetail: This could take a few minutes. This process runs in the background, meanwhile you can use your shop as usual.

log.emptyProductMessage: There are no products in your Sales Channel or dynamic product group.
log.emptyLogMessage: Either no synchronisation has been started or no errors occured.

connection.apiKeyDescription: API keys function like passwords. Shopware will use your iZettle API key to establish a secure connection to your iZettle account.

connection-success.headline: Your iZettle and Shopware accounts are now connected!
connection-success.info: Follow the next steps to finish setting up product synchronisation.
connection-success.disclaimer: Any changes you make to your Shopware products will now automatically be updated in your connected iZettle account.

customization.subtitle: The domain is needed as download URL for media. It needs to be publicly available.

product-selection.header: Pick a Sales Channel for product selection
product-selection.subtitle: You may choose an existing Sales Channel to clone the current selection of products to synchronise. You can add or remove products of your Sales Channel after the setup wizard.

sync.syncPricesSubtitle:
If checked, prices are exported with VAT.
Otherwise product prices will be set to 0 and can be changed in your iZettle product library.
sync.replaceSubtitle: If checked, the existing products in your iZettle product library are removed.

finish.firstParagraph:
Your iZettle account is now linked to your Sales Channel and your products will be transferred to iZettle.
In the future, when you make a sale, we will update your stock in iZettle and Shopware.
finish.secondParagraph: If you need to update your products, we recommend you do this in Shopware and they'll synchronise to your iZettle app automatically.

authentification.messageTestError: The credentials could not be validated.
authentification.apiKeyDescription:
You need to generate an API key at the iZettle website.
The generated key needs to be pasted here to authorise the connection to iZettle.

swag-paypal-izettle.messageCloneError: Could not clone product visibility from another Sales Channel.
